name: vt-open-request
description: Represents a BACnet VT-Open request, used to initiate a new virtual terminal session.

fields.name: vt-class
fields.description: The class of the virtual terminal to be opened.

fields.name: local-vt-session-identifier
fields.description: The identifier assigned to the local VT session.
